subject: NH(O) Projects of MORTH entrusted to NHAI - Timely submission of Revised Cost Estimates to MORTH
text: ATTrdfu <cfty TTTHTf gifaq<ut T9 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (43 Aae7 &r TToHTM TATT4) 454 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QAA Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 U 6, Ader-10, ETG, 7 frorit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Date 16.02.2010 (TEC HNICAL) Policy Circular No. 47/2010 Decision taken on File no.NHAI/TN/Kathipara Junct/2oo6(Part} Sub. NH(O) Projects of MoRTH entrusted to NHAI Timely submission of Revised Cost Estimates t0 MoRTH: In one of the projects sanctioned by the Ministry under NH(O) , the Ministry observed that NHAI continued incurring expenditure beyond the original   sanctioned amount without seeking the approval of Revised Cost Estimate from the Ministry. Ministry directed to find oUt whether some other similar cases also exist and asked to undertake review of the same and fix the responsibility for delays in submission of Revised Cost Estimate: Accordingly, all the divisions of NHAI are hereby  requested to review the sanctioned amounts, expenditure incurred s0 far, status of Revised Cost Estimate, etc, of various NHIO) works projects and take early action for submission of Revised Cost Estimates, if any for approval of the Ministry. skuy { (S.K. Nirmal) Chief General Manager (Coord:) Copy to 1. AII ROs 2 AII GMs 3. AlI PDs 4. PS to all Members Am () 7Tm NHAL
